1. [Home](https://www.rftx.org/)


Upon the issuance of a citation, the Defendant has 30 days to address the court and enter a plea to the charges. Signing the citation is your indication that you
“
” the 30 days. Please wait 2-3 business days after receiving a citation before contacting the court, to allow entry of the citation.

View the alleged charge(s) online at
[https://www.govrec.com/home/romanforestcitx](https://www.govrec.com/home/romanforestcitx "(opens in a new window)")
. Defendants may pay online with a plea and waiver of a jury trial. Paying the ticket prompts the court, if required, to report the violation as a conviction to the TX Department of Public Safety.

[Charged with a Failure to Appear Violation](https://www.rftx.org/municipal-court/page/charged-failure-appear-violation)

[How to Resolve a Ticket](https://www.rftx.org/municipal-court/page/how-resolve-ticket)

[Jury Duty](https://www.rftx.org/municipal-court/page/jury-duty)

[Juveniles & Minors](https://www.rftx.org/municipal-court/page/juveniles-minors)

[Rules of the Court](https://www.rftx.org/municipal-court/page/rules-court)

[Self Help Resources](https://www.rftx.org/municipal-court/page/self-help-resources)
